message: The end goal is that the person who comes behind me can go to Djangopackages.com and end up with some help in making the right choice for them.
for those that have used one or more of these packages, what features did you like, dislike, or helped you choose one over the other?
I just added a bunch of packages to the gallery grid - but both are really lacking in features to compare - here is where my request fits in

So just looking at banging out a quick Django backed gallery of an event, and there is an excess of choices.  Looking for some help sorting out the options, and will contribute back some summary in djangopackages best I can.

There are basically full blown gallery apps, and image processing apps, there are grids on Djangopackages for both:
http://www.djangopackages.com/grids/g/photos/
http://www.djangopackages.com/grids/g/gallery/
